mapper.select: SELECT d.doctor_id , d.doctor_name , d.doctor_phone , h.hospital_name , h.hospital_call , a.address_postal , a.address_address , a.address_detail FROM dt_doctor d LEFT JOIN dt_hospital h ON d.hospital_number = h.hospital_number LEFT JOIN dt_address a ON h.address_number = a.address_number WHERE d.doctor_number = #{doctorNumber}
